p: The essential oils obtained by hydrodistillation of S. rosmarinus aerial parts collected in two areas of Calabria (Southern Italy) were herein investigated. The main constituents are listed in Table 1. Thirty-one compounds were identified, accounting for 97.48 and 98.78% of the total composition of essential oil for R1 (essential oil of S. rosmarinus from Ionian coast) and R2 (essential oil of S. rosmarinus from Tyrrhenian coast), respectively. Chromatograms are reported in Supplementary Materials (Figures S1 and S2).
